name: Terramaster
entries: At 15th level, your connection with your sandstorm allows you to harden it into new shapes. As a Bonus Action, you can coalesce your Sandstorm into a new form. When you do this, you lose any benefits from it until it returns to you. You can create one of the following options:

items: You can create a 10ft by 10ft panel of stone (as detailed in Wall of Stone) without requiring concentration.
You can create a 5ft wide 30ft high pillar (as detailed in Bones of the Earth) without requiring concentration.

entries: These effects last until the stone created is destroyed, you move more than 100ft away from it, or you can choose to destroy them early as a Bonus Action. When deatroyed, the particles of stone return to you, forming your sandstorm around you again.
